name: cut the plants
description:
Hi, I am kamazoultane (14 years old) from France (Lagny-sur-Marne) and I made this game for my first game-jam (Enter-jam 2). The gamejam's orders was to create a game with only one colour. Have fun !

IMPORTANT :

To move, you have to use left and right arrows, to cut the plants or to start, use the spacebar.

                                                   ****** Kako enterprise ******
